newsitem.title: USA: Mitcham Industries shares priced at $7.
newsitem.headline: Mitcham Industries shares priced at $7.

text.p: Mitcham Industries Inc on Thursday said its public offering of three million shares of common stock was priced at $7.00 each.
Of the shares, 2.5 million will be sold by the company and 500,000 will be sold by certain shareholders, Mitcham said.
Rodman & Renshaw Inc and Simmons & Co International are the lead underwriters, said the company, which leases seismic equipment used for oil and natural gas exploration.
The trade date for the shares is March 6 and the settlement will take place on or about March 11.
Net proceeds to the company are expected to be about $15.8 million.
Mitcham and the selling shareholders granted the underwriters a 30-day option to purchase an additional 450,000 shares of common stock to cover overallotments.
The number of shares outstanding was not immediately available.
